channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：汉莎航空客舱乘务员工会呼吁其成员在汉莎航空和短途航空公司 CityLine 举行罢工，以满足他们的加薪要求，争取将工资提高 15
item.description:
WATCH: Lufthansa's cabin crew union called on its members to strike at Lufthansa and short-haul carrier CityLine to press their demands for higher pay, seeking a 15% wage increase pic.twitter.com/2anO96R6m1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 观看：在全球玩具市场下滑 7% 的情况下，乐高公司表示，尽管中国市场出现下滑，但受美国、中欧和东欧强劲增长的推动，其消费者销售额去年增长了 4
item.description:
WATCH: In a global toy market that declined 7%, Lego said its consumer sales grew 4% last year, driven by strong growth in the United States and Central and Eastern Europe, despite a drop-off in China https://t.co/dZNflHDdkZ pic.twitter.com/2I0qpDoc1G

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.description:
WATCH: China's Xiaomi said it will start deliveries of its first electric vehicle (EV) model SU7 this month, venturing into the world's largest auto market amid a brutal price war https://t.co/G2SwjABdmp pic.twitter.com/EnYmbvhdX3

item.title: 观看：据《纽约时报》报道，在今年 1 月阿拉斯加航空公司一架喷气式飞机上的一块面板被炸掉后，联邦航空管理局对波音公司 737 MAX 生产流程进行了审计，在 89 项测试中，有 33 项不合格。
item.description:
WATCH: The Federal Aviation Administration's audit of Boeing's 737 MAX production process after a panel blew off on an Alaska Airlines jet in January failed 33 of 89 tests, the New York Times reported https://t.co/822O7Xcgwx pic.twitter.com/uy5H2BaTa7

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 观看：丹麦玩具制造商乐高表示，尽管中国市场下滑，但去年乐高彩色塑料积木的销量仍有所增长，并在被称为15年来最低迷的玩具市场中抢占了市场份额。
item.description:
WATCH: Lego increased sales of its colorful plastic bricks last year despite a decline in China and grabbed market share in what it called the most downbeat toy market in 15 years, the Danish toymaker said https://t.co/dZNflHDdkZ pic.twitter.com/D8Yr0i5IVg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 观看：尽管S&P全球水务指数（S&P Global Water Index）的表现不如大盘，但ALINE Wealth首席投资官彼得-克莱因（Peter Klein）认为，水务类股票仍然值得考虑。
item.description:
WATCH: Despite the fact that the S&P Global Water Index has underperformed the wider market, Peter Klein, Chief Investment Officer at ALINE Wealth, believes water stocks are still worth considering pic.twitter.com/NR5F6T2o7D

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024
